    Atalis Healthcare Sdn. Bhd. Vacancies Application Specialist - Clinical

    December 1, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Atalis Healthcare Sdn. Bhd. is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Application Specialist - Clinical position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
    • Conducting product demonstrations, application and training for customers and internal team members for medical equipment
    • Provide clinical support and application support to clients
    • Performing instrument setup for clients
    • Plan, organize and conduct courses/ seminar/ workshop on products for customers
    • Work with sales person to meet the sales team demonstration commitments
    • Provide technical training to sales person and work them in developing and planning of sales & marketing related activities
    • Ensuring customer satisfaction in the level of service provided
    REQUIREMENTS
    • Minimum Degree BIOMEDICAL SCIENCES
    • Minimum of 1 year of working experience in application support field is required
    • Possess own transport and willing to travel

    Company Overview

    Atalis Healthcare Sdn Bhd was incorporated in year 2014 and we are an exclusive distributor of wide range of well-known medical equipment and consumables to hospitals, clinic, research centers, universities and other various entities.
    Our company have certified approval from Medical Device Authority. Our vision is to deliver excellence in the healthcare industry.
    We are inviting candidates who seek a challenging and rewarding career with us to apply.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream education sector job in Shah Alam/Subang.
    Apply Online
